For commitment-based, use commitToOffering instead.","params":{"amount":"Investment amount","attestationUIDs":"Array of EAS attestation UIDs (optional - can be empty OfferingCore_initCommitmentBased(address.details: Same as OfferingCore_init but sets isCommitmentBased = true

params.paymentRecipient: Where capital contributions go (typically the fund wallet)

commitToOffering(uint256,bytes32[]).details: Investor commits to provide capital later via capital calls. Tokens are issued immediately.

params.attestationUIDs: Array of EAS attestation UIDs (optional - can be empty array)

returns.roleId: The role ID required for representative signing (0 = not set, uses default 50)

invest(uint256,bytes32[]).details: For standard offerings, requires payment. For commitment-based, use commitToOffering instead.

params.attestationUIDs: Array of EAS attestation UIDs (optional - can be empty array)

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

recordCapitalContribution(address,uint25.details: Used to track capital contributed via capital calls from the fund wallet

setDocumentSignerRole(uint8).details: Only callable by issuer or authorized admin

params.roleId: Role ID to require (e.g., 50 for DOCUMENT_SIGNER_ROLE)

commitToOffering(uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Make commitment to invest (commitment-based offerings only)

getDocumentSignerRole().notice: Get the configured document signer role ID

getInvestorCapitalContributed(address).notice: Get investor's capital contributed toward commitment

getInvestorTotalInvestment(address).notice: Get total investment amount for an investor

getTotalCommitted().notice: Get total commitment amount across all investors

isCommitmentBased().notice: Check if this is a commitment-based offering

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

recordCapitalContribution(address,uint25.notice: Record capital contribution toward a commitment (issuer only)

setDocumentSignerRole(uint8).notice: Set the role ID required for document signing on behalf of entity

updateMinMaxInvestment(uint256,uint256).notice: Update minimum and maximum investment amounts
